mapper.insert: insert into store_information(store_name, store_describe, store_location, dong, lat, lng, member_usercode) values(#{store_name}, #{store_describe}, #{store_location}, #{dong}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{member_usercode})
mapper.update: update store_information set store_grade = (#{class_review_point} + (select store_grade from store_information where storecode)) / ((select store_grade_cnt from store_information where storecode) + 1 ), store_grade_cnt = (select store_grade_cnt from store_information where storecode) + 1
